name: Endless Light (Fussy)
description:
Endless light, a blinding sight, No shadows cast, no reprieve in sight. As day turns into endless day, The light remains, unyielding and gray.

But as the night approaches near, We pray for darkness, for it to appear. Yet when it comes, our fears arise, For the darkness lingers, and never dies.

A world consumed by endless night Forever lost in this abyss, We scream and cry, but no one hears our pleas.

The light was once our biggest fear, But now the darkness is forever near. A world without balance, without hope, We are trapped in this eternal, endless scope.

Endless light, until the night, Forever dark, an eternal fright.
